title: This has been happening a lot lately (screenshot)

replies.body: That might be happening from some of the new fancy animations running in the background "splash art". Try going into your client options and turning on "low-spec mode" and see if that helps!

Stealing a comment to respond to you.

When are they doing to stop "band-aiding" and telling people to enable low-spec mode and just fix the issues? "Enable Low-spec" mode is just a bandaid on a gunshot wound. The issue should be fixed instead of telling people to disable features that are not working properly.

> [{quoted}](name=Piltover Customs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vbVsf3XI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T21:28:12.788+0000)
>
> Stealing a comment to respond to you.
> 
> When are they doing to stop "band-aiding" and telling people to enable low-spec mode and just fix the issues? "Enable Low-spec" mode is just a bandaid on a gunshot wound. The issue should be fixed instead of telling people to disable features that are not working properly.

WHen they say this, they're not saying it as if it's a permanent fix, just a workaround. That doesn't mean they aren't still trying to address issues and improve performance.
